00032 #define EP_MSK_CTRL 0x0001      /* Control Endpoint Logical Address Mask */
00033 #define EP_MSK_BULK 0xC924      /* Bulk Endpoint Logical Address Mask */
00034 #define EP_MSK_INT  0x4492      /* Interrupt Endpoint Logical Address Mask */
00035 #define EP_MSK_ISO  0x1248      /* Isochronous Endpoint Logical Address Mask */
00036

00038 
00039 /*
00040  *  Get Endpoint Physical Address
00041  *    Parameters:      EPNum: Endpoint Number
00042  *                       EPNum.0..3: Address
00043  *                       EPNum.7:    Dir
00044  *    Return Value:    Endpoint Physical Address
00045  */
00046 
00047 DWORD EPAdr (DWORD EPNum) {
00048   DWORD val;
00049 
00050   val = (EPNum & 0x0F) << 1;
00051   if (EPNum & 0x80) {
00052     val += 1;
00053   }
00054   return (val);
00055 }
00056 
00057 
00058 /*
00059  *  Write Command
00060  *    Parameters:      cmd:   Command
00061  *    Return Value:    None
00062  */
00063 
00064 void WrCmd (DWORD cmd) {
00065 
00066   DEV_INT_CLR = CCEMTY_INT;
00067   CMD_CODE = cmd;
00068   while ((DEV_INT_STAT & CCEMTY_INT) == 0);
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 /*
00073  *  Write Command Data
00074  *    Parameters:      cmd:   Command
00075  *                     val:   Data
00076  *    Return Value:    None
00077  */
00078 
00079 void WrCmdDat (DWORD cmd, DWORD val) {
00080 
00081   DEV_INT_CLR = CCEMTY_INT;
00082   CMD_CODE = cmd;
00083   while ((DEV_INT_STAT & CCEMTY_INT) == 0);
00084   DEV_INT_CLR = CCEMTY_INT;
00085   CMD_CODE = val;
00086   while ((DEV_INT_STAT & CCEMTY_INT) == 0);
00087 }
00088 
00089 
00090 /*
00091  *  Read Command Data
00092  *    Parameters:      cmd:   Command
00093  *    Return Value:    Data Value
00094  */
00095 
00096 DWORD RdCmdDat (DWORD cmd) {
00097 
00098   DEV_INT_CLR = CCEMTY_INT | CDFULL_INT;
00099   CMD_CODE = cmd;
00100   while ((DEV_INT_STAT & CDFULL_INT) == 0);
00101   return (CMD_DATA);
00102 }

00105 /*
00106  *  USB Initialize Function
00107  *   Called by the User to initialize USB
00108  *    Return Value:    None
00109  */
00110 
00111 void USB_Init (void) {
00112 
00113   PLog("Call: void USB_Init (void)");
00114 
00115   PINSEL1 &= ~0x3C000000;                 /* P0.29 USB1_D+, P0.30 USB1_D- */ 
00116   PINSEL1 |=  0x14000000;                 /* PINSEL1 26.27, 28.29         */
00117 
00118   PINSEL3 &= ~0x30000030;                 /* P1.18 GoodLink, P1.30 VBus   */
00119   PINSEL3 |=  0x20000010;                 /* PINSEL3 4.5, 28.29           */
00120   PINSEL0 &= ~(3 << 26);
00121   PINSEL3 &= ~(3 << 4);
00122 
00123   /* The SoftConnect pin for LPC2300 on USB_U1 doesn't work for now, 
00124      make it GPIO and make it low to turn on pull-up on D+. 
00125          Once it's fixed, make #if 1 and set it as SoftConn Pin. */
00126 #if 0
00127   PINSEL4 &= ~0x000C0000;                 /* P2.9 USB1 SoftConnect        */
00128   PINSEL4 |= 0x000040000;                 /* PINSEl4 18.19                */
00129 #else
00130   PINSEL4 &= ~0x000C0000;
00131   FIO2DIR |= (1 << 9);
00132   FIO2CLR  = (1 << 9);
00133 #endif
00134         
00135   PCONP |= 0x80000000;                    /* USB PCLK -> enable USB Per.  */
00136 
00137   OTG_CLK_CTRL = 0x12;                    /* Dev clock, AHB clock enable  */
00138   while ((OTG_CLK_STAT & 0x12) != 0x12);
00139   
00140   VICVectAddr22 = (unsigned long)USB_ISR; /* USB Interrupt -> Vector 22   */
00141   VICVectCntl22 = 0x01;                   /* USB Interrupt -> Priority  1   */
00142   VICIntEnable = 1 << 22;                 /* Enable USB Interrupt         */
00143 
00144 //  DEV_INT_EN = DEV_STAT_INT;              /* Enable Device Status Interrupt */
00145 
00146 #if 1 /* Partial Manual Reset since Automatic Bus Reset is not working */
00147   USB_Reset();
00148   USB_SetAddress(0);
00149 #endif
00150 }

00153 /*
00154  *  USB Connect Function
00155  *   Called by the User to Connect/Disconnect USB
00156  *    Parameters:      con:   Connect/Disconnect
00157  *    Return Value:    None
00158  */
00159 
00160 void USB_Connect (BOOL con) {
00161   WrCmdDat(CMD_SET_DEV_STAT, DAT_WR_BYTE(con ? DEV_CON : 0));
00162 }

00165 /*
00166  *  USB Reset Function
00167  *   Called automatically on USB Reset
00168  *    Return Value:    None
00169  */
00170 
00171 void USB_Reset (void) {
00172 
00173   EP_INDEX = 0;
00174   MAXPACKET_SIZE = USB_MAX_PACKET0;
00175   EP_INDEX = 1;
00176   MAXPACKET_SIZE = USB_MAX_PACKET0;
00177   while ((DEV_INT_STAT & EP_RLZED_INT) == 0);
00178 
00179   EP_INT_CLR  = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00180   EP_INT_EN   = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00181   DEV_INT_CLR = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00182   DEV_INT_EN  = DEV_STAT_INT    | EP_SLOW_INT    |
00183                (USB_SOF_EVENT   ? FRAME_INT : 0) |
00184                (USB_ERROR_EVENT ? ERR_INT   : 0);
00185 
00186 }

00212  *  USB Remote Wakeup Function
00213  *   Called automatically on USB Remote Wakeup
00214  *    Return Value:    None
00215  */
00216 
00217 void USB_WakeUp (void) {
00218 
00219   if (USB_DeviceStatus & USB_GETSTATUS_REMOTE_WAKEUP) {
00220     WrCmdDat(CMD_SET_DEV_STAT, DAT_WR_BYTE(DEV_CON));
00221   }
00222 }

00236 /*
00237  *  USB Set Address Function
00238  *    Parameters:      adr:   USB Address
00239  *    Return Value:    None
00240  */
00241 
00242 void USB_SetAddress (DWORD adr) {
00243   WrCmdDat(CMD_SET_ADDR, DAT_WR_BYTE(DEV_EN | adr)); /* Don't wait for next */
00244   WrCmdDat(CMD_SET_ADDR, DAT_WR_BYTE(DEV_EN | adr)); /*  Setup Status Phase */
00245 }

00248 /*
00249  *  USB Configure Function
00250  *    Parameters:      cfg:   Configure/Deconfigure
00251  *    Return Value:    None
00252  */
00253 
00254 void USB_Configure (BOOL cfg) {
00255 
00256   WrCmdDat(CMD_CFG_DEV, DAT_WR_BYTE(cfg ? CONF_DVICE : 0));
00257 
00258   REALIZE_EP = 0x00000003;
00259   while ((DEV_INT_STAT & EP_RLZED_INT) == 0);
00260   DEV_INT_CLR = EP_RLZED_INT;
00261 }
00262 
00263 
00264 /*
00265  *  Configure USB Endpoint according to Descriptor
00266  *    Parameters:      pEPD:  Pointer to Endpoint Descriptor
00267  *    Return Value:    None
00268  */
00269 
00270 void USB_ConfigEP (USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR *pEPD) {
00271   DWORD num;
00272 
00273   num = EPAdr(pEPD->bEndpointAddress);
00274   REALIZE_EP |= (1 << num);
00275   EP_INDEX = num;
00276   MAXPACKET_SIZE = pEPD->wMaxPacketSize;
00277   while ((DEV_INT_STAT & EP_RLZED_INT) == 0);
00278   DEV_INT_CLR = EP_RLZED_INT;
00279 }

00357 
00358 /*
00359  *  Read USB Endpoint Data
00360  *    Parameters:      EPNum: Endpoint Number
00361  *                       EPNum.0..3: Address
00362  *                       EPNum.7:    Dir
00363  *                     pData: Pointer to Data Buffer
00364  *    Return Value:    Number of bytes read
00365  */
00366 
00367 DWORD USB_ReadEP (DWORD EPNum, BYTE *pData) {
00368   DWORD cnt, n;
00369 
00370   USB_CTRL = ((EPNum & 0x0F) << 2) | CTRL_RD_EN;
00371 
00372   do {
00373     cnt = RX_PLENGTH;
00374   } while ((cnt & PKT_RDY) == 0);
00375   cnt &= PKT_LNGTH_MASK;
00376 
00377   for (n = 0; n < (cnt + 3) / 4; n++) {
00378     *((__packed DWORD *)pData) = RX_DATA;
00379     pData += 4;
00380   }
00381 
00382   USB_CTRL = 0;
00383 
00384   if (((EP_MSK_ISO >> EPNum) & 1) == 0) {   /* Non-Isochronous Endpoint */
00385     WrCmd(CMD_SEL_EP(EPAdr(EPNum)));
00386     WrCmd(CMD_CLR_BUF);
00387   }
00388 
00389   return (cnt);
00390 }
00391 
00392 
00393 /*
00394  *  Write USB Endpoint Data
00395  *    Parameters:      EPNum: Endpoint Number
00396  *                       EPNum.0..3: Address
00397  *                       EPNum.7:    Dir
00398  *                     pData: Pointer to Data Buffer
00399  *                     cnt:   Number of bytes to write
00400  *    Return Value:    Number of bytes written
00401  */
00402 
00403 DWORD USB_WriteEP (DWORD EPNum, BYTE *pData, DWORD cnt) {
00404   DWORD n;
00405 
00406   USB_CTRL = ((EPNum & 0x0F) << 2) | CTRL_WR_EN;
00407 
00408   TX_PLENGTH = cnt;
00409 
00410   for (n = 0; n < (cnt + 3) / 4; n++) {
00411     TX_DATA = *((__packed DWORD *)pData);
00412     pData += 4;
00413   }
00414 
00415   USB_CTRL = 0;
00416 
00417   WrCmd(CMD_SEL_EP(EPAdr(EPNum)));
00418   WrCmd(CMD_VALID_BUF);
00419 
00420   return (cnt);
00421 }
00422

00425 /*
00426  *  Get USB Last Frame Number
00427  *    Parameters:      None
00428  *    Return Value:    Frame Number
00429  */
00430 
00431 DWORD USB_GetFrame (void) {
00432   DWORD val;
00433 
00434   WrCmd(CMD_RD_FRAME);
00435   val = RdCmdDat(DAT_RD_FRAME);
00436   val = val | (RdCmdDat(DAT_RD_FRAME) << 8);
00437 
00438   return (val);
00439 }
00440 
00441 
00442 /*
00443  *  USB Interrupt Service Routine
00444  */
00445 
00446 void USB_ISR(void) __irq {
00447   DWORD disr, val, n, m;
00448 
00449   disr = DEV_INT_STAT;                      /* Device Interrupt Status */
00450   DEV_INT_CLR = disr;                       /* A known issue on LPC214x */
00451 
00452   /* Device Status Interrupt (Reset, Connect change, Suspend/Resume) */
00453   if (disr & DEV_STAT_INT) {
00454     WrCmd(CMD_GET_DEV_STAT);
00455     val = RdCmdDat(DAT_GET_DEV_STAT);       /* Device Status */
00456     if (val & DEV_RST) {                    /* Reset */
00457       USB_Reset();
00458 #if   USB_RESET_EVENT
00459       USB_Reset_Event();
00460 #endif
00461       goto isr_end;
00462     }
00463     if (val & DEV_CON_CH) {                 /* Connect change */
00464 #if   USB_POWER_EVENT
00465       USB_Power_Event(val & DEV_CON);
00466 #endif
00467       goto isr_end;
00468     }
00469     if (val & DEV_SUS_CH) {                 /* Suspend/Resume */
00470       if (val & DEV_SUS) {                  /* Suspend */
00471         USB_Suspend();
00472 #if     USB_SUSPEND_EVENT
00473         USB_Suspend_Event();
00474 #endif
00475       } else {                              /* Resume */
00476         USB_Resume();
00477 #if     USB_RESUME_EVENT
00478         USB_Resume_Event();
00479 #endif
00480       }
00481       goto isr_end;
00482     }
00483   }
00484 
00485 #if USB_SOF_EVENT
00486   /* Start of Frame Interrupt */
00487   if (disr & FRAME_INT) {
00488     USB_SOF_Event();
00489   }
00490 #endif
00491 
00492 #if USB_ERROR_EVENT
00493   /* Error Interrupt */
00494   if (disr & ERR_INT) {
00495     WrCmd(CMD_RD_ERR_STAT);
00496     val = RdCmdDat(DAT_RD_ERR_STAT);
00497     USB_Error_Event(val);
00498   }
00499 #endif
00500 
00501   /* Endpoint's Slow Interrupt */
00502   if (disr & EP_SLOW_INT) {
00503 
00504     while (EP_INT_STAT) {                   /* Endpoint Interrupt Status */
00505 
00506       for (n = 0; n < USB_EP_NUM; n++) {    /* Check All Endpoints */
00507         if (EP_INT_STAT & (1 << n)) {
00508           m = n >> 1;
00509 
00510                   // Log
00511                   //PLogN("Evt: ENPOINT_IRQ, EPNum: ");
00512                   //PLogNum(n);
00513                   //newline();
00514                   // Log
00515 
00516           EP_INT_CLR = 1 << n;
00517           while ((DEV_INT_STAT & CDFULL_INT) == 0);
00518           val = CMD_DATA;
00519 
00520           if ((n & 1) == 0) {               /* OUT Endpoint */
00521             if (n == 0) {                   /* Control OUT Endpoint */
00522               if (val & EP_SEL_STP) {       /* Setup Packet */
00523                 if (USB_P_EP[0]) {
00524                             
00525                  USB_P_EP[0](USB_EVT_SETUP);
00526                   continue;
00527                 }
00528               }
00529             }
00530             if (USB_P_EP[m]) {
00531               USB_P_EP[m](USB_EVT_OUT);
00532             }
00533           } else {                          /* IN Endpoint */
00534             if (USB_P_EP[m]) {
00535             USB_P_EP[m](USB_EVT_IN);
00536             }
00537           }
00538         }
00539       }
00540     }
00541   }
00542 
00543 isr_end:
00544 //  DEV_INT_CLR = disr;
00545   VICVectAddr = 0;                          /* Acknowledge Interrupt */
00546 }
